entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of snow near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
